mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_question (qna_id, category, title, content, member_id, created_at, is_answered) VALUES (qna_question_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{member_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{is_answered, jdbcType=CHAR})
